Package storage

Interface StorageManager<L,​O>

  • Type Parameters:
    L - the type of locations of objects in the StorageManager
    O - the type of objects managed by the StorageManager
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BufferedFileManager, FileManager
    public interface StorageManager<L,​O>
    A StorageManager manages a storage space.
    Author:
    Jeong-Hyon Hwang (jhh@cs.albany.edu)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static class  StorageManager.InvalidLocationException
      An InvalidLocationException is thrown if an invalid location is used.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      L add​(int fileID, O o)
      Adds the specified object in the specified file.
      void clear​(int fileID)
      Removes all data from the specified file.
      L first()
      Returns the first location in any file.
      O get​(int fileID, L location)
      Returns the object at the specified location in the specified file.
      java.util.Iterator<java.lang.Object> iterator​(int fileID)
      Returns an iterator over all objects stored in the the specified file.
      O put​(int fileID, L location, O o)
      Puts the specified object at the specified location in the specified file.
      O remove​(int fileID, L location)
      Removes the specified object at the specified location in the specified file.

throws java.io.IOException
        Adds the specified object in the specified file.

      • put

        O put​(int fileID,
      L location,
      O o)
throws java.io.IOException,
      StorageManager.InvalidLocationException
        Puts the specified object at the specified location in the specified file.
        Parameters:
        fileID - the ID of the file
        location - the location of the object
        o - the object to put
        Returns:
        the object stored previously at the specified location in the specified file; null if no such object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs
        StorageManager.InvalidLocationException - if an invalid location is given
